alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; Northern Orange; Southern Orange; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 7:21PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN JEFFERSON AND ORANGE COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CST... At 721 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gist to 7 miles east of Anahuac. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Port Arthur, Orange, Nederland, Groves, Port Neches, Vidor, Bridge City, West Orange, Central Gardens, Mauriceville, Rose City, Pine Forest, Pinehurst, Orangefield, Fannett, and Southeast Texas Regional Airport. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 880 and 838. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Jefferson; Northern Orange; Southern Orange; Upper Jefferson
